alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 1:39PM CDT until June 02 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Denton Creek Near Justin affecting Denton County. For the Denton Creek...including Justin...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Denton Creek Near Justin. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur to farm and ranch lands near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
